content: a little bit you may need to use the eraser end of a pencil to get the stuffing all the way down into the foot tail row instruction stitches 1 using white 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 7 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 change to brown yarn at the end of round 7 8 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 20 bind off stuff tail firmly i ve found it s easier to sew the tail on later if it s not too stuffed at the top so you can flatten that part a little bit you may need to use the erasor end of a pencil to get the stuffing all page 4 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com the way down into the tail ears make 2 row instruction stitches 1 using brown 4 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the joining chain from the 10 previous round join chain 1 3 work 2 single_crochet in same stitch as joining single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet work 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 12 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 4 *decrease over next 2 stitches* around slip_stitch to join and bind off 6 leaving an 8 long tail so you can sew the ears to the head later on **do not stuff the ears they will lay flat mouth / butt patch make 2 this piece is worked in more of an oval than in the round you ll start out with a chain work down the usual side then crochet on the back side or bottom of the chain row instruction stitches 1 starting with red 12 chain 5 work 2 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in the next 2 chain 4 single_crochet in the next chain working on the bottom now single_crochet in next 2 chain 2 single_crochet in the last chain slip_stitch to join to the first single_crochet chain 1 to start your next round change to white at the end of this round 2 *single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase in next 2 single_crochet* repeat 16 3 *single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet increase in next 2 single_crochet* repeat 20 change to brown at the end of this round 4 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 bind off leaving a long tail to sew each piece to the body later one will go on the head for the mouth and the other will go on the back for it s butt these are where the heels are on a regular sock monkey page 5 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com fez row instruction stitches 1 using red 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 *2 single_crochet in each single_crochet* around 12 3 *single_crochet
